headline: How Ford’s Lowered 2025 Guidance and Production Delays (F) Have Shifted Its Electrification Path
summary: Ford reported stronger-than-expected Q3 earnings but lowered its 2025 full-year guidance due to production delays stemming from a fire at a key aluminum supplier, alongside adjustments to its electric vehicle rollout and continued focus on internal combustion engine vehicles. This operational pivot underscores how supply chain disruptions and shifts in consumer demand are prompting Ford to recalibrate its electric vehicle ambitions and resource allocation. We'll explore how Ford's production...
